title: Strategies for Utilizing Virtual Classroom Learning Management Systems (LMS) at Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage proficiency (smartphone utilization)
context.additional_context: Customized education program for science undergraduates in a workplace context, conducted in limited-technology environments with low PC ownership and smartphone dominance.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize basic functions of a virtual classroom LMS (assignment submission, material review, discussion boards) with 90% accuracy
Learners can collect class satisfaction survey data using online survey tools and perform simple frequency analysis
Learners can explain their learning progress in three stages (early/mid/late) based on LMS statistical data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
